actions.text: Amendment SA 4903 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4903 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $6,000,000 for research and development on bioterrorism threats to troops.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4903 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bayh.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4903 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $6,000,000 for research and development on bioterrorism threats to troops.
